channel.title: Self-Awareness on Dominic Minischetti
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Awareness on Dominic Minischetti

item.title: Changing My Mind Doesn’t Make Me Weak—It Makes Me Smarter
item.description: Changing your mind isn’t a weakness—it’s growth. Discover why evolving your perspective makes you smarter and more adaptable.

item.title: Why We Romanticize the Past (And Why It’s a Trap)
item.description: We often think the past was better, but nostalgia tricks us. Discover why we romanticize the past and how to appreciate the present.
